Articles.Content:
This is a small app i built to auto archive my persistent file every time a new one is created allowing me to undo mistakes.

Basic Instructions

Go to settings -> Save Location. Then select the presistent file of your choice click Open.

press Start monitoring.

Start KSP.

get it from link below source included.

LICENCE is do anything you like with it. Would apreciate my name on it though.

http://www.megafileupload.com/en/file/602629/PFMonitor-zip.html

Edited January 26, 2015 by aron123
